about_the_game:
Fantasy Network is a metroidvania game with a social media twist. Explore the colorful world of Holua and chat to hand-drawn, larger-than-life characters to discover a story that runs deeper than it may seem.


Welcome to Holua!


A lively young girl named Lyn wakes up one morning and discovers that someone kidnapped her mother. To see her again, she has to win the President's race by beating the other opponents in the various talent shows. To do that, she needs to hone her skills to the highest level. That's the beginning of a long, exciting adventure that will take her around Holua to meet extravagant characters and fight bizarre enemies until she will discover the deep and ancient truth buried in that world.

  • Help Lyn fulfill her mission in this colorful and animated action adventure! Explore its evocative environments across beaches, volcanoes, glaciers, temples, seas, and also the ancient cosmic space!
  • Collect Crebits, the game world's electronic currency, to buy new equipment, smartphone apps, and travel tickets and enjoy cities attractions!
  • Enjoy a challenging gameplay loaded with action with jumps, double-jumps, somersaults, and rapid dashes in its platformer levels.
  • Take on the large and colorful variety of enemies with the various configurations that your umbrella provides!
  • Keep yourself constantly in touch with Holua's citizens through social apps, ask them for info, and post photos of your adventures to gather more and more likes!
  • Compete in cooking, racing, gaming, dance, and fashion talent shows until you win them all and become the new President of Holua!
  • Investigate side quests to piece together the complete history of Holua and uncover the incredible mystery that all the inhabitants were unaware of!
    • If you need a break from adventuring, why not chill out with five retro, pixel art arcade games or hang out with Holua’s residents?
detailed_description:
JOIN US ON DISCORD!


About the Game

Fantasy Network is a metroidvania game with a social media twist. Explore the colorful world of Holua and chat to hand-drawn, larger-than-life characters to discover a story that runs deeper than it may seem.


Welcome to Holua!


A lively young girl named Lyn wakes up one morning and discovers that someone kidnapped her mother. To see her again, she has to win the President's race by beating the other opponents in the various talent shows. To do that, she needs to hone her skills to the highest level. That's the beginning of a long, exciting adventure that will take her around Holua to meet extravagant characters and fight bizarre enemies until she will discover the deep and ancient truth buried in that world.

  • Help Lyn fulfill her mission in this colorful and animated action adventure! Explore its evocative environments across beaches, volcanoes, glaciers, temples, seas, and also the ancient cosmic space!
  • Collect Crebits, the game world's electronic currency, to buy new equipment, smartphone apps, and travel tickets and enjoy cities attractions!
  • Enjoy a challenging gameplay loaded with action with jumps, double-jumps, somersaults, and rapid dashes in its platformer levels.
  • Take on the large and colorful variety of enemies with the various configurations that your umbrella provides!

  • Compete in cooking, racing, gaming, dance, and fashion talent shows until you win them all and become the new President of Holua!
  • Investigate side quests to piece together the complete history of Holua and uncover the incredible mystery that all the inhabitants were unaware of!
    • If you need a break from adventuring, why not chill out with five retro, pixel art arcade games or hang out with Holua’s residents?

short_description: Fantasy Network is a metroidvania game with a social media twist! Explore the colorful world of Holua and chat to hand-drawn, larger-than-life characters to discover a story that runs deeper than it may seem. Help Lyn to safe her mother and win the President's race!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
